description: Send HTTP requests to webhook endpoints with support for signatures, retries, and various content types.

webhook_url.info: The URL endpoint to send the webhook request to.

method.info: HTTP method to use for the webhook request.

headers.info: Additional HTTP headers as JSON object. Example: {"Authorization": "Bearer token", "Custom-Header": "value"}

content_type.info: Content-Type header for the request payload.

secret_key.info: Secret key for generating request signatures (HMAC). Leave empty to disable signing.

signature_method.info: Method to use for generating payload signatures (requires secret key).

signature_header.info: Name of the header to include the generated signature.

retry_count.info: Number of times to retry failed requests (0 to disable retries).

verify_ssl.info: Whether to verify SSL certificates for HTTPS requests.

follow_redirects.info: Whether to automatically follow HTTP redirects.

include_request_info.info: Whether to include request information in the response data.

text_key.info: The key to use for the text field in the Data objects.
